name: Roots of Life
description:
Collect all the root vegetables before time runs out! Watch out for the eagle attacks!

Controls

Arrow Keys or W-A-S-D for Movement

*Sound Included

Jam Information

Weekly Game Jam - Week 166, Theme: 'Roots'

Credits

Audio by LightspeedLife
